column4: what is vmware? Can I use it to install another OS on top of Ubuntu?
there's awiki about using kqemu too - which is quicker than qemu
https://wiki.ubuntu.com/KQEmu  <-- look here for enhanced qemu speed
thanks. The Qemu page also mentions KQemu and -- at least at first glance -- different instructions... which one should I follow?
did you follow the full instructions? And is this on breezy?
and I just used the insQEMU.sh script, instead of the other detailed one
the whole thing compiled and installed flawlessly here
As far as I can see, the full instructions are "download the script and run it" -- is there something more?
hmm, I did it a while ago...
I actually don't really remeber to be honest
